name: Dating Life: Miley X Emily - Bonus Content & Guide
detailed_description:
This bonus DLC pack for the game Dating Life: Miley X Emily includes four sets of bonus materials to enjoy.
  • Dating Life Original Soundtrack with Theme Song
  • Dating Life Set of 1080p Wallpapers
  • Dating Life High Resolution Dakimakura Images
  • Dating Life PDF Guide

All four sets once installed will appear in the game directory, in a new folder called 'Bonus Materials'.
The contents of which have been included in zip archives.
about_the_game:

short_description: A bonus pack of materials from the game, including the Soundtrack, Wallpapers, Digital Dakimakuras & a PDF Guide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
